articles.author: Jude Karabus
articles.title: Amazon's latest directive: Report to the office 'cos we're watching you - The Register
articles.description: Worker bees protest that they were read the riot act even when they did come in
articles.content: Amazon has contacted staff it says are not clocking into the office three days a week "even though your assigned building is ready," according to a leaked memo which warns them they're falling short … [+5674 chars]
